game.name: Auto Chess Souls-棋魂之弈
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 전략
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Auto Chess Souls is a casual strategy adventure game that combines auto-chess and roguelike elements. Through consecutive choices, your team grows increasingly stronger. Explore the unknown tower, collect powerful equipment, create unique powerful combinations. Embark on this exciting adventure now!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Auto Chess Souls is a casual strategy adventure game that combines auto-chess and roguelike elements. Through consecutive choices, your team grows increasingly stronger. Explore the unknown tower, collect powerful equipment, create unique powerful combinations. Embark on this exciting adventure now!
